attributes.action: TLScontact is compelling Nigerian applicants to pay for the premium service fee.
attributes.additional_details: All applicants that submitted today were compelled to pay the premium service fee of £89.00 equivalent ₦37,000 Naira
attributes.background: TLScontact (UK Visa Application Centre) in Nigeria is compelling all Nigerian UK Visa applicants to pay for the premium service fee of £89.00 equivalent ₦37,000 Naira,even when the fee is optional as stated in the Home Office Application form.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You can find out how to complain about UK Visas and Immigration here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/uk-visas-and-immigration/about/complaints-procedure

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
